name: Criminal Escape: Pixel Chase Full
description:
Take a part in ultimate cop chase being a criminal driver! Start extreme racing adventure driving powerful pixel cars and other vehicles! Burn the asphalt under the wheels of your cube car and race as fast as possible! Car thefts, breaking the law, arrests… Feel like a real driver racing his car made of blocks with Criminal Escape: Pixel Chase!

Criminal Escape: Pixel Chase game has everything you ever wanted from a sports car racing game and even more! Live the life of a criminal driver and never let the police catch you! Upgrade your pixel car to the top level – fast engines, stylish wheels, modern navigation system! Test your racing skills on a traffic filled pixel city highway! Cube police cars are nearby! Pull the accelerator pedal as a criminal driver and make this blocky car disappear from cop’s radars! This car theft will never be solved! Feel the extreme driving stolen pixel vehicles with Criminal Escape: Pixel Chase! Feel like a real criminal breaking the law!

Drive your car fast to escape from police chase! Are you going to be imprisoned? Avoid arrest at all costs! Smash stolen cube cars, escape from the police, break the law and have fun! Have you ever tried to drive cars after its theft? Try it with Cube Chase 3D: Cop Escape – great driving simulator for those who loves extreme racing! Steal the best pixel cars in whole Cube World!

Criminal Escape: Pixel Chase features:

- Huge to explore – it’s all made of blocks! Cute cube cars and pixel environment
- Extreme cop chase – escape the pursuit and don’t let the police catch you
- Great racing game in 3D
- Powerful sports pixel cars

Test your driving skills – race fast to avoid arrest! Enjoy sitting behind the sterling wheel of powerful blocky car and enjoy being a criminal! Never let the police catch you with Criminal Escape: Pixel Chase!
